Package eu.h2020.helios_social.core.contextualegonetwork

Class CrossModuleComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.h2020.helios_social.core.contextualegonetwork.CrossModuleComponent
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Edge, Node
    public abstract class CrossModuleComponent
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used as a base class by HELIOS components, such as Node and Edge instances that need to store data coming from multiple modules. The getOrCreateInstance(java.lang.Class<ModuleObjectDataType>) method can be used to create and access instances of data structures needed by each module.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      <ModuleObjectDataType>
      ModuleObjectDataType      		 getOrCreateInstance​(java.lang.Class<ModuleObjectDataType> moduleClass)
      Returns an instance of the given class that is stored in the node.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getOrCreateInstance

        public <ModuleObjectDataType> ModuleObjectDataType getOrCreateInstance​(java.lang.Class<ModuleObjectDataType> moduleClass)
        Returns an instance of the given class that is stored in the node. If no such instance exists, a new one is created first using the default construtor. Created instances are saved and loaded alongside nodes if these are part of a contextual ego network structure. (Note, if they reference objects that aren't registered in the Serializer, these are loaded as separate instances.)
        Parameters:
        moduleClass - A given class (e.g. that stores the node's data needed by a HELIOS module)
        ModuleObjectDataType - The type of the returned object (is resolved to the same as the type of the class)
        Returns:
        An instance of the given class
